dct_title_s: [Series of maps of Palestine from Fulton's Palestine]
dct_description_sm: [John Fulton] ; drawn by H. Kiepert ; engraved & printed by Wagner & Debes.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
7 bar scales on map: "Paces", "Yards", "MÃ¨tres", "English miles", "Geographical miles", "English stat. miles", and "Miles".
Shows topography, drainage, territorial boundaries of the tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
4 inset maps: Southern suburb -- Sinai enlarged -- Red Sea crossing -- The kingdoms of Israel and Judah.
Appears in Fulton's Palestine: the Holy Land as it was and as it is. Philadelphia, H.T. Coates & Co., 1900.
